title: Ticket #6222: condor_q should use a projection when fetching schedd location
description: In #5150, condor_q was enhanced so that it used a reasonable projection of just a few attributes when querying the collector for the schedd ad. However, a projection was only being used when the "-name" command line option was supplied to condor_q. With this patch, condor_q will use a projection in all other cases as well (e.g. with options like -global, -submitter, ...).
